name: Dominus (itch)
description:
This a game about dominos, where you place them, and knock them over. Complete the levels by making a successful domino chain from the yellow domino to the green one, and press space to launch it.

Controls:

WASDQE- fly around

Shift + MouseX - rotate

Click- place domino

Shift + MouseY- Launch Domino (Sandbox)

Space- Launch Domino (Campaign)
